Package fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2023e1.equipments.hairdryer

Interface HairDryerImplementationI

All Known Subinterfaces:
HairDryerUserCI
All Known Implementing Classes:
HairDryer, HairDryer, HairDryerConnector, HairDryerInboundPort, HairDryerOutboundPort
public interface HairDryerImplementationI
The interface HairDryerImplementationI defines the signatures of services service implemented by the hair dryer component.

Description

Black-box Invariant

 invariant      true        // no invariant

Created on : 2023-09-19

Author:
Jacques Malenfant

      void turnOn() throws Exception
      turn on the hair dryer, put in the low temperature and slow fan mode.

      Contract

       pre    getState() == HairDryerState.OFF
 post   getMode() == HairDryerMode.LOW

      set the hair dryer in high mode.

 post   getMode() == HairDryerMode.HIGH

 post   getMode() == HairDryerMode.LOW
